import React from 'react'; import { FaFacebookF, FaTwitter, FaSkype, FaLinkedinIn, FaPhoneAlt, FaEnvelope } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './Footer.css'; const Footer = () => { return (

); }; export default Footer;
